name: Settlement Of The West
description:
Settlement of the West! A terrific and truly epic idle game where buying, upgrading and defending is merged into one simple gameplay that is easy to play. No need to play with a friend that isn't always able to, simply listen to some music and embark on a game that simply needs only you to play. A great game. Downloads, donations and any other support is greatly appreciated!

Latest updates feature: Three difficulties; pause menu; saving system; game speed dial; Ai tweaks; Bug fixes; Improved victory animations; 

Note- 1.4 is now the finished product as the bulk of the game has been completed. You can check out earlier versions of the game by downloading 1.3, 1.2 and 1.1 .  Due to the game's completion an update will be released every once and a while for improvements.
